raw_answer.rationale: Detected both bottom x-axis (0–160) and top x-axis (0–100%) tick scales in the same plot area.

trace.model_output_excerpt:
THOUGHT: The chart visually appears to include two horizontal scales (one bottom 0–160, and a top axis with a percent scale), suggesting dual-axis usage which can mislead comparisons.

ACTION: {"tool":"axis_localizer","args":{"image":{"$ref":"input.image"},"axis":"top_x","axis_threshold":0.2}}
